questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and bookshelves
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a library or study room
D) In a residential area

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The bookshelves
B) The painting of a peacock
C) The lighting fixtures
D) The ceiling design

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large window
B) A bookshelf
C) A painting of a peacock
D) A fireplace

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) A garden
C) Wooden bookshelves filled with books
D) A blank wall

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A table and chairs
B) A person reading a book
C) The lower part of the bookshelves
D) A couch

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The bookshelves frame the central painting
B) The painting is on the floor
C) The lighting fixtures are on the ceiling
D) The books are scattered on the floor

What type of lighting is used in the photo?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Ceiling lights
C) Wall-mounted lamps
D) Floor lamps

What is the color of the wood used for the bookshelves?
A) Light oak
B) Dark walnut
C) Cherry wood
D) Pine

What is the dominant color in the painting?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow & Green

What is the subject of the painting?
A) A landscape
B) A portrait
C) A peacock
D) A cityscape

What is the style of the painting?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Impressionist
D) Surrealist

What is the primary material used for the shelves?
A) Metal
B) Glass
C) Wood
D) Plastic

What kind of books are placed at the top of the shelves?
A) Wrapped in white paper
B) Unwrapped and colorful
C) Stacked horizontally
D) Placed in boxes

What is the height of the bookshelves?
A) Floor to ceiling
B) Waist height
C) Half wall height
D) Low shelves

Is there any visible furniture in the photo?
A) Yes, a table
B) Yes, a chair
C) No, only shelves and books
D) Yes, a couch

Are there any decorations other than the painting and books?
A) Yes, a vase
B) Yes, a clock
C) No, only the painting and books
D) Yes, a sculpture

Are the bookshelves filled completely?
A) Yes, every shelf is full
B) No, some shelves are empty
C) Only the top shelves are full
D) Only the bottom shelves are full

What kind of art is featured in the center of the photo?
A) Sculpture
B) Painting or Photograph
C) Photograph
D) Tapestry

What is the main feature of the painting in the center?
A) A tree
B) A mountain
C) A peacock
D) A river

What is the frame color of the painting?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gold
D) Silver

What kind of wall decor is behind the painting?
A) Plain paint
B) Wallpaper with a geometric pattern
C) Tiled wall
D) Wooden paneling

What is the overall theme of the room in the photo?
A) Nautical
B) Industrial
C) Vintage library
D) Futuristic

What is the main color scheme of the room?
A) Blue and white
B) Green and brown
C) Red and black
D) Brown and beige

Are there any personal items visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many personal items
B) Yes, a few personal items
C) No, only books and art
D) Yes, a collection of toys

What is the texture of the wall behind the painting?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured with a pattern
D) Glossy

Are there any electronic devices visible in the photo?
A) Yes, a television
B) Yes, a computer
C) No, only books and lighting
D) Yes, a radio

What is the dominant material used in the room?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What is the lighting style in the room?
A) Natural
B) Ambient
C) Task
D) Accent

What is the primary feature of the center of the photo?
A) A window
B) A mirror
C) A painting of a peacock
D) A clock

What colors are predominant on the bookshelves?
A) Brown
B) Red and black
C) Yellow and white
D) Pink and purple

What additional elements are present on the bookshelves?
A) Picture frames
B) Plants
C) Wrapped gifts
D) Candles

What is the main color of the peacock in the painting?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

How many wall-mounted lamps are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the material of the bookshelves?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Glass
